title: How to Glide in Destiny

steps.headline: Level up as a Warlock.
steps.description: Play through missions until you reach level 3.

steps.headline: Once you are level 3, you will unlock the glide ability.
Press 'A/X' to jump.
steps.description: While in midair, press 'A/X' again mid-jump to glide.

text: Level up as a Warlock. Play through missions until you reach level 3. Once you are level 3, you will unlock the glide ability. Upgrade as soon as possible. Press 'A/X' to jump. While in midair, press 'A/X' again mid-jump to glide.
